changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE oauth2_registered_client ( id VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY, client_id VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, client_id_issued_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, client_secret VARCHAR(200), client_secret_expires_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, client_name VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, client_authentication_methods VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, authorization_grant_types VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, redirect_uris VARCHAR(1000), post_logout_redirect_uris VARCHAR(1000), scopes VARCHAR(1000), client_settings BYTEA NOT NULL, token_settings BYTEA NOT NULL );
